name: #thatnurserylife
slogan: fastest growing platform for early years professionals
description:
The original content we produce for our users includes:

- Free EYFS activity plans which childcare staff can use at work with children
- Policy & legislation updates to keep professionals up to date
- Debate and discussion pieces about key sector issues
- Thought provoking/motivating articles to support CPD
- The "EY Agony Aunt" answering user's professional worries
- Job listings so professionals can find their next job

For our advertising clients, we offer a flexible range of products. Our TNLAds revenue stream includes traditional digital banner ads, along with popular advertorial content options and sponsorship of website sections. Priced from £295 up to £1050 individually, TNLAds are always sold as a combined campaign. TNLJobs products are for recruiters to promote their vacancies. Our 4 week individual listing costs £115, cheapest in market, and our "Unlimited Listing Plans" allow high volume recruiters to list roles for a fixed, recurring monthly fee.

team.title: CEO
team.name: Sam Green
team.bioHtml: Serial entrepreneur, currently developing a number of new ventures across sectors including education, digital marketing, food & beverage & healthcare

jobs.title: Chief Commercial Officer
jobs.description:
Following 10 months of boot-strapped work to grow an audience of over 60,000 people on our niche platform, we are now moving to rapidly scale our revenue, profit and impact.

Our CCO will be responsible for:

- developing and implementing an effective sales process across our 2 product groups, including preparing effective methods for training new sales hires 

- overall ownership of the sales pipeline, ensuring that we make good progress against our commercial OKRs

- strategic input on the development of the platform, its features and the content we produce to enhance its commercial value

This is one of the founding roles for a business with outstanding growth prospects. We are looking for someone who is ready to join the rollarcoaster ride that is a true start-up journey, and who has the proven expertise to become a commercial leader in this business.

Initially the CCO will be responsible, in partnership with the CEO, for actively securing sales and growing revenue. As our scale-up progresses, the role will develop into an increasingly mangerial and strategic one as new team members take up the active sales activity.

WHAT'S ON OFFER...

- An outstanding comission structure which offers the opportunity to earn £40K+ in your first 12 months, with prompt payment after deal closure

- Generous equity stake over a tight vesting period

- A full salary trigerred by transparent revenue targets being met, with quarterly salary reviews

- All work related expenses covered from day 1 - we don't expect people to pay to work

- The chance to take on a founding leadership role in an exciting business, with global plans

jobs.title: Chief Technology Officer (CTO)
jobs.description:
Following 10 months of boot-strapped growth with a rough and ready MVP, we are now moving to rapidly scale up our sector impact, audience and profitability. With over 60,000 people already using our niche platform, we need a talented developer to invest their skills in the re-construction and ongoing development of thatnurserylife.com.

Our CTO will be responsible for:

- completing a complete rebuild of our platform according to the functional requirements set out by the CEO

- agreeing a technical road-map for the next 6 - 18 months with the CEO and other senior leaders in the business

- with the principle rebuild complete, designing and recruiting a technical team/outsourced solution who will be able to deliver on the road map

- remaining a strategic technical advisor until exit in 3 - 5 years

WHAT'S ON OFFER...

- Generous equity stake of up to 15% of this revenue generating business, poised for growth

- All work related expenses covered from day 1 - we don't expect people to pay to work

- The chance to take on a founding leadership role in an exciting business, with global plans
